title: Configuration of the time display: AM-PM or 24-hour format
content: Configure your schedules in the format of your choiceDepending on your preferences, Emprez offers two-time displays: AM/PM or 24 hour format.To choose the format desired, click on your first name at the tom right to access your Preferences,Under Hour format, choose the desired format,Click on Validate,Do not hesitate to disconnect and then reconnect to your Emprez session to activate the update.Display in AM-PM format at 12 noon, without having AM-PM detailsFor more visual clarity, in order to remove the AM-PM you can click on   at the top right of your schedules.If you click on it when it is red  , the AM-PM indications will reappear. Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
